remarks: Value of the less-than relationship.  Definition 5.4 of [Schwabhauser] p. 41.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Jun-2019.)
statement:

legval.d $e |- .- = ( dist ` G ) $.

legov.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. P ) $.

legov $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A .- B ) .<_ ( C .- D ) <-> E. z e. P ( z e. ( C I D ) /\ ( A .- B ) = ( C .- z ) ) ) ) $.
